days.title: Sleep Science - The Mystery of Rest
days.learning_objective: Understand sleep biology while exploring how sleep research informs workplace policy, healthcare, and personal wellbeing practices.

days.title: Scientific Revolution - The Birth of Modern Science
days.learning_objective: Understand knowledge revolution while exploring how scientific institutions and methods can either support or undermine democratic governance.

days.title: Space Exploration - Humanity's Journey to the Stars
days.learning_objective: Explore space technology while understanding how space exploration can inspire international cooperation and technological innovation.

days.title: Geometry - The Mathematics of Shape and Space
days.learning_objective: Master spatial reasoning while understanding how geometric thinking enables engineering, art, and architectural design.

days.title: Computer Science Fundamentals - How Machines Think
days.learning_objective: Understand computational thinking while building algorithmic literacy essential for participating in technological governance and AI policy.

days.title: Gender Studies - Understanding Identity and Roles
days.learning_objective: Explore gender analysis while understanding how gender equity connects to human rights, economic justice, and democratic participation.

days.title: Nanotechnology - Engineering at the Atomic Scale
days.learning_objective: Explore molecular engineering while understanding how nanotechnology requires careful regulation to ensure safety and equitable access.

days.title: Renewable Energy Technology - Powering the Future
days.learning_objective: Understand sustainable energy while exploring how renewable technology transitions require policy innovation and community engagement.

days.title: Space Technology - Tools for Exploring the Universe
days.learning_objective: Explore aerospace engineering while understanding how space technology enables communication, navigation, and Earth monitoring.

days.title: Materials Science - Creating New Substances
days.learning_objective: Understand material properties while exploring how materials innovation enables technological progress and sustainable development.

days.title: Quantum Computing - The Next Computer Revolution
days.learning_objective: Explore quantum information while understanding how quantum technology will affect cryptography, simulation, and computational capabilities.

days.title: Battery Technology - Storing Energy
days.learning_objective: Understand energy storage while exploring how battery innovation enables renewable energy, electric transportation, and grid stability.

days.title: Invention Process - From Idea to Reality
days.learning_objective: Practice innovation methodology while understanding how invention systems can either democratize or restrict technological development.

days.title: Solar Technology - Capturing Sunlight
days.learning_objective: Explore photovoltaic systems while understanding how solar technology can enable energy independence and climate change mitigation.

days.title: Water Technology - Managing Earth's Most Precious Resource
days.learning_objective: Understand water systems while exploring how water technology affects public health, agriculture, and international relations.

days.title: Political Science - The Study of Government and Power
days.learning_objective: Understand political systems while building civic knowledge essential for democratic participation and government accountability.

days.title: Geography - Understanding Earth's Human Patterns
days.learning_objective: Explore spatial analysis while understanding how geographic knowledge informs urban planning, resource management, and social equity.

days.title: Linguistics - The Science of Language
days.learning_objective: Understand language systems while exploring how linguistic diversity enriches human culture and enables cross-cultural communication.

days.title: Entrepreneurship - Starting New Ventures
days.learning_objective: Practice venture creation while understanding how entrepreneurship can either increase or decrease economic equity and social impact.

days.title: Active Listening - Truly Hearing Others
days.learning_objective: Practice communication skills while understanding how active listening enables conflict resolution, empathy building, and democratic dialogue.

days.title: Empathy & Kindness
days.learning_objective: Practice compassionate action while understanding how empathy and kindness strengthen social bonds and enable collective care.

days.title: Molecular Motion - How Particles Move and Interact
days.learning_objective: Understand kinetic theory while exploring how molecular science enables materials engineering and drug development.

days.title: Coastal Processes - Where Land Meets Sea
days.learning_objective: Understand marine geology while exploring how coastal management requires sustainable development and climate adaptation planning.

days.title: Women's Rights - The Struggle for Gender Equality
days.learning_objective: Understand gender justice while building advocacy skills for human rights protection and social equity advancement.

days.title: Game Theory - The Mathematics of Strategy
days.learning_objective: Understand strategic thinking while exploring how game theory informs economics, international relations, and conflict resolution.

days.title: Chaos Theory - Order Within Apparent Randomness
days.learning_objective: Explore complex systems while understanding how chaos theory helps predict weather, understand ecosystems, and manage uncertainty.

days.title: Focus and Concentration - Training Your Attention
days.learning_objective: Practice attention regulation while understanding how focus skills enable learning, productivity, and mindful civic engagement.

days.title: Criminology - Understanding Crime and Justice
days.learning_objective: Understand justice systems while exploring how criminal justice reform can advance human rights and community safety.

days.title: Printmaking - Reproducing Images
days.learning_objective: Practice reproductive arts while understanding how printmaking historically enabled information sharing and democratic communication.

days.title: Confidence Building - Believing in Yourself
days.learning_objective: Practice self-efficacy while understanding how confidence enables leadership, advocacy, and effective participation in democratic processes.

days.title: Memory Improvement - Strengthening Your Recall
days.learning_objective: Master memory techniques while understanding how memory skills support learning, cultural preservation, and cognitive resilience.
